replies.body:
We're from MC Zone- or at least that's how I remember this server. We've been around since the beginning of Avicus- and the end of MCZone.
My best friends were probably boborian9 and savagelizard. We were pretty much legends at monument taking- mostly bob- while me and savage were great at defending; my bow skills and savage's pvp skills were good enough to the point where we almost never let a single monument up in a single match.
They've quit since though. Bob's take more than 250 monuments- and I think anyone who's taken that much deserves an honorary mention. Anyways, I'm back.
http://avicus.net/boborian9
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Ok let me seriously answer this now...

Although he doesn't play on Avicus anymore, or barely when I sometime ask him, KooDaLord is the greatest friend I have ever made on Avicus. We skype nearly everyday. :))


A few more worth mentioning names (reason)
- CocoaLatteSauce (FIRST FRIEND ON AVICUS. GG.)
- FightToWin (Model for Attitude.)
- Vlushy (Model for Moderator.)
- Aversively (Model for Kindness.)
- Slicorn (Elimination)
- Kiawwa (Nexus)
- LampY (Nexus)
- Killerbye (Nebula)
- Boss_turtle (Nebula)
- Roboticboy (TS)
- DoctaPop (TS)
- Sulorak (TS)
- Doozie (TS) 
- MissCarmel (TS)
- Ducksfanwaterloo (TS)
- Mooch (TS)
- Evocal (World Edit Mentor)  He taught me how to copy and paste.... :')
- ParaSpider (YAML Mentor)

Although I don't frequently go on TeamSpeak, everyone who has the (TS) tag made me want to come back more often :))

Honorable Team mentions.
- The Sistahood. (Howsie ily)
- Team Supernova
- Team Allah
